string.text: Your enemy must feel humiliated after being killed by you ten times in a row and failing to kill you even once during this time! You are not cruel, though - you're just giving him a reason to keep practicing.
Time to Reap
You're deadly! Killing two birds with one stone... You skewered them both with your Gauss rifle.
Skewer
Your calm and calculating approach brings a swift death to the enemy, as you expertly hit two targets with two shots of your double-barreled shotgun in the space of a couple of seconds.
Two shots, two kills.
You obviously know what being a stalker is all about, which is why you're become the number one legendary stalker!
Social Climber
Cutting through an exoskeleton with a knife? It looks like you’re the kind who likes to cut right down to the bone.
Tin Opener
They thought they had you, but you showed them who's boss by killing five of them, despite knock'in on death's doorstep yourself!
Die Hard
What an adrenalin rush! You annihilated your enemy with a hail of bullets - 5 kills in five seconds! Sweet!
Unbridled Rage
Looks like saying 'the nail on the head' - it is about you. Double kill the enemy thus managing to not die - wow!
Eye Specialist
Let them hide behind corners and lay their ambushes - that won't stop you. Hell, you can hit a target on the move without even aiming!
Lightning Reflexes
Let him run as fast as he can - your bullets will catch him either way.
Stop the Runner
This carnage ... You killed one by one or as many as twenty opponents, having gone through them all!
Massacre
Let them were three of them and everyone - sniper rifle, your skill allowed udelat them all.
Most Accurate Shooter
You don't need to fire a single round to outwit the barbarians.
Peace Messenger
Distance is not a problem for a real sniper! You can hit the bull's eye at distances over 120 meters.
Deadly Accuracy
The enemy still got you. But imagine his surprise when next to your rucksack, he found a cocked grenade!
Something to Remember You By
They killed your friends and therefore deserved revenge. Three enemy corpses for three slain - still quite lenient offer.
Avenger
You have become a guardian angel to ally with the artifact. By killing enemies, who twice tried to intercept it, you saved the life of his friend.
Cherub
You kept your honor and your team's by putting some points on the board.
Keeping Your Honor
Do you really know where the next artifact will show up? Well, you picked it up in a matter of seconds when it appeared!
Stalker's Intuition
Yes you are lucky ... It's necessary - to fill up the last bullet in the enemy's machine shop! However, even better luck to you than your enemy.
Lucky Bastard
You killed eight enemies in a row. You've drawn a line in the sand - let's see if they're willing to cross it.
Blacklist
Nobody killed you because you're careful and cautious. You didn't die once during the game and scored over fifteen points.
Paranoia
You love to do their job without attracting too much attention, so always are using a silencer. And why should the enemy to know where he was killed?
Silent Death
You destroyed your enemy by winning and scoring twice as many points as their leading scorer.
Overwhelming Superiority
Your bold plan to instantly capture the artifact was successful and within the first three minutes of the game you scored for your team.
Blitzkrieg
You annihilated the enemy without giving up a single artifact. That’ll show them what real team work is all about.
Shutout!
You scored highest in every area by getting the most kills, the most artifacts and dying the least! Keep it up!
All-rounder
Your blade skills are unrivaled! You gutted three enemies in twenty seconds, showing off your hand skills.
Fury
Even the most experienced opponent exists a weak Marked One. Did you find him 'Achilles' heel', a pistol shot straight into his eyes ....
Achilles' Heel
The enemy's bullets are powerless against you. You walk through them without a scratch and moe the enemy down!
Faster Than Bullets
What would the new does not appear in the Zone, you are ready to explore it first. Finding new, yet izuch¸nye anomalous formations, you have advanced the science of understanding the Zone.
Pioneer
Stalkers are better applies to you. \n To somehow thank you, stalkers from time to time leave cartridges in your personal box at the station 'Midsummer'.
You do not try to avoid dangerous mutants you lead them hunting, and succeeded. Good hunters - respected people among stalkers.
Mutant Hunter
Stalkers are better applies to you. \n Out of respect for you, stalkers from time to time leave medicine in your personal box on the 'Skadovsk'.
You opened the mystery of the disappearance of stalkers with 'Skadovska' - do not blame mutants, and more dangerous enemy - man. Your desire to find the truth brought to you compliments of stalkers.
Detective
Stalkers are better applies to you. \n At the request of stalkers, trader Owl made for you a discount. \n Beard offers the best prices for artifacts.
Giving rebuff to the bandits led by the Sultan, you have gained in popularity among stalkers. Always glad to see you on the 'Skadovsk'.
One of Ours

Bandits have to treat you with respect. \n Dealer Sych fear that the next victim could be he has done for you a discount. \n According to the agreement, Beard should pay you a percentage of their income.
You helped Sultan outmaneuver the stalkers and take Beard’s business under your control. You are now feared and respected at Zaton.
Boss
possessions Magpies obtained meanness and deceit, stalkers will give to someone who deserves it more. His production laid down in your personal box in the 'Midsummer'.
You have not given scoundrel escape justice. Stalker Soroka not just turn the other under attack and did not hesitate in the methods. Now it is waiting for the fair retribution.
Courier of Justice
Stalkers are better applies to you. \n Bandits will haunt you during raids in the Zone.
You found every type of artifact known to Zone researchers. This earned you the respect of stalkers and the close attention of bandits.
Artifact Hunter
Cardan can make a unique modification that allows you to quickly navigate to the exoskeleton: add hydraulic servo amplifiers.
Now Cardano has toolkits for any occasion. This will allow him to make inaccessible to this improvement.
Weapon Systems Expert
Nitrogen can make a unique modification of tactical helmet: infrared scanner that allows you to capture people in the vicinity.
Nitrogen was all toolkits, which can only dream of techniques in the zone. Now he can engage in high-tech modifications.
Hi-Tech Expert
Your experience allows you to find rare artifacts more often.
At the center of the zone almost no seats available, your attention bypassed. You have visited almost all local anomalies.
Seasoned Stalker
Your leadership qualities improve your team’s chances of survival.
Faced with the need to work in a team, you have collected a good squad than proven their leadership skills.
Leader
Freedom, Duty, free stalkers and even bandits have come to recognize your negotiation skills, and think highly of you as a result.
You know how to solve problems in a peaceful way. Not necessary to use force if everything can be solved by negotiation. However, you should beware of those who shoot first and ask later.
Diplomat
You've been working with scientists that deserves the title of researcher. Now all the inhabitants of the research bunker apply to you as his.
Research Assistant

Your relationship with the 'long' improved. If you get into trouble, the soldiers 'long' try to come to your aid. 
 Technician Nitrogen like 'long', so I made for you a discount. 
 Your relationship with Liberty deteriorated. 
 Hawaiian - trader, sympathetic 'Freedom' - has raised the prices of their goods.
You helped a lot of group 'long' and gained credibility among its fighters and their friends. But do not forget that not all sympathize with 'long'.
A Friend of Duty

Your relationship with Liberty improved. If you get into trouble, the soldiers 'Freedom' will try to come to your aid. 
 Hawaiian - trader, sympathetic 'Freedom' - did you a discount. 
 your relationship with the 'long' deteriorated. 
 Technician Nitrogen like 'long', so increased the price of their services.
You have provided plenty of help to Freedom, and this has earned you the respect of Freedom fighters and their friends. But keep in mind that not everyone in the Zone is a Freedom fan.
A Friend of Freedom
For stalkers to 'Midsummer' essential balance 'long' and 'Freedom', so the technician and the trader will make a discount.
You did not give preference to any group, and have always done as a free stalker. As a result - not amassed new enemies, but have not acquired new friends.
A Man of Balance
Traders offer you more rare and expensive goods.

Although you are familiar with the lack of money, you can not always be called a cash-strapped. On the contrary, at times, your cash savings to be envied. These clients - a great joy for the merchant.
A Wealthy Client
After receiving the note, Shooter found a new reason to survive and reach to the target in that at all costs.
You can not deny the foresight - found a note in the recesses of Arrow Group, you do not leave them until you have found the person to whom they belong.
A Keeper of Secrets

You survived the ejection, not hiding in the shelter - you saved anabiotika tablets. This has had a mixed impact on your mind - in your head came a strange silence. It seems you do not hear a steady stream of thoughts.
Marked by the Zone
Merchant Owl made you a discount as the best ally and Informant in the profession.

Whatever information did not get to you in your hands, you are always on a buyer. Not missing opportunities to provide information of interest, you are, of course, did not forget about their own advantage.
Trafficker of Information
Your relationship with stalkers improved. If you get into trouble, stalkers try to come to your aid. \n Stalkers medical agreed to sell you drugs at cost.
Meeting stalkers in trouble, you always cared for. Stalkers are not too cohesive, but tacit stalker brotherhood you have some allies who can help you in battle and its aftermath.
A Friend of Stalkers
Various new information allowed Professors Hermann and Ozersky to create a new experimental drug, an anabiotic, in the Zone.
You have a chance of surviving an emission even without the aid of drugs, provided your health is in order.

Given how useful you are, Professor Hermann is now offering you medical supplies and equipment intended exclusively for bunker personnel at cost price. \n Novikov is so used to you that he only wants you to pay for parts when performing modifications.
